3D_OBJECT_DESCRIPTION: a cup of water and a small-necked bottle (neck radius is round 0.1)
GOAL_DESCRIPTION: pour the water into the bottle and avoid sprinkling
3D_CONFIGURATION:
self.bottle = self.scene.add_entity(morph=gs.morphs.Mesh(filename='bottle.obj', pos=(0.143, 0.5, 0.156), euler=(90, 0, 0)))
self.cup = self.scene.add_entity(morph=gs.morphs.Mesh(filename='cup.obj', pos=(0, 0.3, 0.064), euler=(90, 0, 0)))
